A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The destroyed the essence of the mythology\, which consisted of the struggle of good to vanquish evil\, and traded it in for 21st Century Nihilism\, where \"nothing really matters...especially archaic tradition.\"   But\, if good needs evil\, if light needs dark\, and if peace needs violence\, why care about oppression and victimization?  This proves to be the most philosophically inconsistent movie ever made.
